cause.description:
Fuck stopping dog fighting and rooster fighting. Let the cocks and bitches duel it out till the the sun stops rising. Stop homo sapiens from waging war on eachother. Occupational, "liberation", or CIA funded genocides, all have to go. Obviously Facebook isnt the place to start a movement (well maybe it is), but if our opinions are being stored and analyzed by the State Dept or Central Intell Agency LET US be Heard. Fuck War, and Fuck the Ones who perpetuate War. Lets make a change people.
1. Equal Rights and Justice FOR ALL!!!!!!
2. Stop loading the pockets of the few with Bordens or Benjamins
3. Love your enemies.
cause.name: Stop Human Fighting
